content:
Detailed Guidelines on DGFT & Foreign Trade Services

EPCG (Export Promotion Capital Goods) & Post EPCG - 
Import of capital goods at zero or concessional customs duty.
Export Obligation (EO) = 6x duty saved in 6 years.
Post EPCG → regularisation, EO extension, clubbing of licences, redemption.


DGFT & Foreign Trade Services – Guidelines Table:
